data.title: Jason Biggs Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Jason Biggs with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Although known for playing Jewish characters, he's actually Italian-Catholic

Made his TV debut in the short-lived sitcom Drexell's Class

Was nominated for a Daytime Emmy for his work on the soap As the World Turns

Broadway debut was in Conversations with My Father, opposite Judd Hirsch, Tony Shaloub and David Krumholtz, in March 1992

Once worked at a Gap Kids store in a New Jersey mall

Breakthrough role was as Jim Levenstein in American Pie

Appeared as Benjamin Braddock in the Broadway adaptation of The Graduate, opposite Alicia Silverstone and Kathleen Turner, in April 2002

Met his wife, actress Jenny Mollen, on the set of 2008's My Best Friend's Girl

Contributed a poem to the 2010 anthology What's Your Exit? A Literary Detour Through New Jersey

Is active with animal-welfare charities
